rules.natural: Either the conservation agency hires the field researcher or the conservation agency hires the policy advisor.

Provided that the government department approves the conservation plan, then in case it is not true that if the wildlife biologist assesses ecosystem health then when the forest reserve is protected it is not polluted, the conservation project does not receive funding.

Whenever the environment board approves the conservation plan, then if it is not the case that the wildlife biologist's assessment of ecosystem health implies that protection of the forest reserve entails it is not polluted, the conservation project does not receive funding.
Should the project manager supervise the field team, the project manager reports to the government department.
Either the project manager supervises the field team or the senior scientist supervises the field team.
If the senior scientist supervises the field team, then either the government department approves the conservation plan or the environment board approves the conservation plan.
When the project manager coordinates stakeholders, then either the government department approves the conservation plan or the environment board approves the conservation plan.
The project manager reports to the government department only if the project manager coordinates stakeholders.

In case the environment agency investigates the pollution claim, then either water sources are contaminated or, assuming the chemist analyzes water samples, protection of the forest reserve implies it is not polluted.
If the conservation agency hires the policy advisor, then the conservation project is successful.

Whenever the NGO investigates the pollution claim, then either water sources are contaminated or, given that the chemist analyzes water samples, the forest reserve being protected means it is not polluted.
The public oversight committee being active implies that either the environment agency investigates the pollution claim or the NGO investigates the pollution claim.
Should the lab technician test soil samples, then if the forest reserve is protected, it is not polluted.
Whenever soil testing requires new equipment, new equipment is available.
If the procurement head authorizes the purchase, then either new equipment is ordered or new equipment is not available.
Either the procurement head authorizes the purchase or the director authorizes the purchase.
Provided that the director authorizes the purchase, then new equipment is ordered or new equipment is not available.
Either the forest reserve is polluted or, if the conservation agency hires the field researcher, the conservation project is successful.
The conservation project being extended implies that it is not suspended.

If the funding committee reviews the project status, then in case it is not true that failure of the condition that the wildlife biologist monitoring the forest reserve implies protection leads to no pollution qualifies the project for emergency funding, the conservation project is extended.
Either the funding committee reviews the project status or the audit panel reviews the project status.

Should the audit panel review the project status, then if it is not the case that the negation of the wildlife biologist monitoring implying protection without pollution leads to qualification for emergency funding, the conservation project is extended.
The botanist identifying endangered species implies that plant species are threatened.
Either the botanist identifies endangered species or the ecologist identifies endangered species.
In case the ecologist identifies endangered species, then if the botanist studies plant species, protection of the forest reserve entails it is not polluted.
The wildlife biologist monitoring the forest reserve implies that the conservation agency employs the wildlife biologist.
Either the wildlife biologist monitors the forest reserve or the ecologist monitors the forest reserve.
Provided that the ecologist monitors the forest reserve, then if the forest reserve is protected, it is not polluted.
Should the conservation agency employ the wildlife biologist, the chemist analyzes water samples.
If the conservation agency employs the wildlife biologist, then the lab technician is certified.
Whenever the conservation agency employs the wildlife biologist, the botanist studies plant species.
The conservation agency employing the wildlife biologist implies that the wildlife biologist documents biodiversity.
In case the conservation agency employs the wildlife biologist, the wildlife biologist assesses ecosystem health.
Provided the wildlife biologist documents biodiversity, then if the forest reserve is protected, it is not polluted.
If it is not the case that the lab technician being certified implies testing soil samples, then soil testing requires new equipment.
Should it not be the case that the wildlife biologist monitoring the forest reserve leads to protection without pollution, then the conservation project does not qualify for emergency funding.
Whenever it is false that the wildlife biologist assessing ecosystem health implies protection without pollution, the conservation project receives funding.

Provided that it is not the case that the negation of the wildlife biologist monitoring implying protection without pollution leads to qualification for emergency funding, the conservation project is suspended.
